basicInfo.title: Basic Information
basicInfo.tipText: Build buyers confidence with a clear, detailed service listing.
basicInfo.name: Name
basicInfo.categoryTip: This information will help us categorize your service.
basicInfo.tip: This Service will appear to buyers in:

images.title: Images
images.subtitle: Image Tips
images.tip2: Use a white or natural background.
images.tip3: Ensure bright lighting with minimal shadows.
images.tip4: Include front, side, and close-up views.

price.title: Price
price.label: Price
price.note: Price negotiable based on project scope

availability.title: Service Availability
availability.note: Service availability refers to the times or days when the service is offered by you. This ensures buyers know when they can expect the service to be provided, allowing them to plan accordingly.
